## Packages
```{r}
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

```

## Data Import
```{r}
encounters <- read_csv("encounters.csv")
```

## Data Cleaning
```{r}
encounters_clean <- encounters %>%
 filter(START >= "1990-12-31 18:00:00" & 
          START <= "2040-01-01 00:00:00") %>%
 filter(STOP >= "1990-12-31 18:00:00" & 
          STOP <= "2040-01-01 00:00:00") %>%
 filter(ENCOUNTERCLASS %in% c("emergency", "inpatient", "outpatient", "urgentcare"))
```

## Data Visualization
```{r}
 ggplot(encounters_clean) +
 aes(x = ENCOUNTERCLASS, y = TOTAL_CLAIM_COST) +
 geom_col(fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal()
```

```{r}
 enc_bar <- ggplot(encounters_clean) +
 aes(x = ENCOUNTERCLASS, y = TOTAL_CLAIM_COST) +
 geom_col(fill = "#112446") +
 theme_minimal()

ggplotly(enc_bar)
```
